sentences.english: In the temple men drew near to God with music and pantomimes (out of this later the theatre developed).
sentences.chinese: 在聖殿的裏面，人類企圖親近上帝。

sentences.english: Simeon's this holy man living in the temple, again there's that theme of the temple.
sentences.chinese: 西面是住在聖殿中的聖人，這裏又再次提到了聖殿。

sentences.english: Simeon's this holy man living in the temple, again there's that theme of the temple.
sentences.chinese: 西面是住在聖殿中的聖人，這裏又再次提到了聖殿。

sentences.english: The fulness of the gospel, including all temple ordinances, is then available to us.
sentences.chinese: 豐滿的福音，包括所有的聖殿教儀，已經賜與我們。

sentences.english: Then he descended the steps of the Temple and all the people followed him.
sentences.chinese: 他步下聖殿的臺階，人們跟隨着他。

sentences.english: All that remains of this building is the " Western Wall, " also known as the "Wailing Wall.
sentences.chinese: 存留至今的聖殿遺蹟只有其西牆，即著名的“哭牆”。

sentences.english: Had he ever served in the temple?
sentences.chinese: 他曾參與聖殿的事奉嗎？
比如在聖殿山發生的故事。

sentences.english: In Triple Saints' Hall, we talked about who's who of the 3 statues inside the hall.
sentences.chinese: 在三聖殿和驢友討論過裏面的三座雕像分別是誰。

sentences.english: Today, the Knights Templar is the name of a branch of Freemasonry.
sentences.chinese: 如今，聖殿騎士已經成爲共濟會的一個分支的名字。

sentences.english: Paul had just come back to Jerusalem to present money at the temple.
sentences.chinese: 保羅爲了到聖殿去投錢，剛回耶路撒冷。

sentences.english: which departed not from the temple, but served God with fastings and prayers night and day" (Luke 2:36-37)
sentences.chinese: 並不離開聖殿，禁食祈求，晝夜事奉神。

sentences.english: Others again adopt an orientation of the rectangular shrine itself.
sentences.chinese: 寺的方向，必須朝着麥加的聖殿“克爾白”這一要求。

sentences.english: Supermarkets may be temples of worship for the members of the congregation.
sentences.chinese: 超級市場對會衆成員來說可能是崇拜的聖殿。

sentences.english: They suborn witnesses to testify that he has spoken against Moses and the Temple.
sentences.chinese: 他們收買證人作證說，他已表示反對摩西和聖殿。

sentences.english: Frankincense was a kind of incense, used to worship God in the temple.
sentences.chinese: 乳香是一種香料，在聖殿裏敬拜神的時候使用。

definition: elder/term of respect for a Buddhist monk
to merge together (idiom); to unify disparate elements into one whole
